${modID}:PowerID.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${modID}:TaiChi.NAME: Tai Chi
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain #b%d #yBlock. Whenever you play a non-attack card, deal #b%d damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Splash.NAME: Splash
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal #yAttack damage, deal #b%d%% of that damage to all other enemies.

${modID}:Ramp.NAME: Ramp
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your maximum [E] by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.
